duties_responsibilities.duty: Make decisions at the enterprise level for salesforce, data, and integration architecture.
Define the enterprise system to integrate salesforce with on-Prem and legacy systems.
Lead technical decisions and development on sales, community, and lightning.
Define and execute the architecture for the Health Cloud and HLS system integration.
Utilize expertise in Salesforce to lead technical development and architecture decisions.
Provide technical leadership and guidance in the design and implementation of Salesforce solutions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree required; Master's Degree is a plus.
Salesforce Certified Integration Architecture Designer, Salesforce Certified Architect, Salesforce Certified Sales Cloud Consultant (Any 2 certifications needed)
